arts.ttl: Tom Rothe shines as Union Berlin see off Holstein Kiel
arts.sum: Sunday's action kicked off in the Bundesrepublik with Holstein Kiel hosting Union Berlin. Goals from Alioscha Kemlein and Tom Rothe secured a 2-0 win for Die Eisernen.

arts.ttl: Holstein Kiel vs. Union Berlin preview: Hosts searching for first win
arts.sum: Holstein Kiel will look to end the wait for their first Bundesliga win when they welcome Union Berlin to Holstein-Stadion on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Preview: Holstein Kiel vs. Union Berlin - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Bundesliga clash between Holstein Kiel and Union Berlin, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
